trash_review_manifest.description: Safe deletions and waste files moved for review

items.reason: Duplicate outdated server file - replaced by server.js
items.justification: This is an old version of the server with hardcoded MongoDB connection and missing security features. Current server.js has proper environment variables, security middleware, and validation.

items.reason: Unused React logo - not referenced in any source files
items.justification: Default React logo that is not imported or used anywhere in the application.

items.reason: Unused default React CSS - not imported in any component
items.justification: Default Create React App CSS file that is not imported. Project uses Tailwind CSS for styling.

items.reason: Default React logo not customized for Akash Share
items.justification: Default React PWA logo. Should be replaced with Akash Share branding but keeping for now as it's referenced in manifest.json.

items.reason: Default React logo not customized for Akash Share
items.justification: Default React PWA logo. Should be replaced with Akash Share branding but keeping for now as it's referenced in manifest.json.
